# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security vulnerabilities via GitHub Security Advisories:
https://github.com/Kuonirad/thermo-truth-proto/security/advisories

## Security Features

All releases include:
- Sigstore signatures
- SLSA provenance
- SBOM (Software Bill of Materials)

See RELEASING.md for verification instructions.
